arts.ttl: Pedri begs 'half asleep' Barça to 'turn it around'
arts.sum: Midfielder Pedri said Barcelona must turn things around quickly as their alarming run of form continued with a shock 1-0 defeat at home to Leganés on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Leader Barcelona loses to Leganes as Atletico Madrid moves level on points at top of Spanish league
arts.sum: Playing in the first of five La Liga matches on Sunday, Atletico won its sixth consecutive league game to move a point clear of Real, which could only draw 3-3 with Real Vallecano on Saturday. Barcelona stayed top of the Spanish league despite a shock 1-0 home defeat on Sunday to lowly Leganes, a team that had not won away all season.

arts.ttl: Sergio Gonzalez effort enough as Leganes record famous victory at Barcelona
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid closed the gap as the top two stumbled.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 0-1 Leganes: Highlights, man of the match, stats as visitors record historic victory
arts.sum: Barcelona suffer their fourth La Liga defeat of the campaign as Leganes stun the division leaders with a 1-0 victory at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs Leganes Preview: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Score Prediction
arts.sum: Barcelona will look to capitalise upon Real Madrid’s failure to beat Rayo Vallecano when they face Leganes in La Liga tonight. Ahead of the clash, we’ve made a prediction for the game,...

arts.ttl: Barcelona Predicted Lineup vs. Leganes: La Liga
arts.sum: Barcelona aim to bounce back against Leganes after just one win in their last five La Liga fixtures.
